parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Local protection
parameter.description: Enables/disables local entry. If activated module stops responding to S1 and S2 push buttons, SCENE ID and association commands will not be sent. Only exception is the B-button.

options.option: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to push buttons
Local protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to push buttons

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Radio protection
parameter.description: Enables/disables RF protection. If activated device stops responding to command frames. Configuration and polling still possible.

options.option: No protection. Roller Shutter responds to command frames.
RF Protection active. Roller Shutter does not respond to the Z-Wave control frames.

parameter.name: config_3_1
parameter.label: 3: Reports type
parameter.description: Parameters value shoud be set to 1 if the module operates in Venetian Blind mode.

options.option: Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Z-Wave Command Class.
Blind position reports sent to the main controller using Fibar Command Class.

parameter.name: config_12_2
parameter.label: 12: Turning time/ delay time
parameter.description: In Venetian Blind mode (parameter 10 set to 2) the parameter determines time of full turn of the lamellas. In Gate Mode (parameter 10 set to 3 or 4) the parameter defines the delay time after which an open gate starts closing. Type range

parameter.name: config_13_1
parameter.label: 13: Lamellas positioning mode
parameter.description: Parameter influences the lamellas positioning in venetian blind mode (parameter 10 set to 2)

options.option: Lamellas return to previously set position only in case of the main controller operation.
Lamellas return to previously set position in case of the main controller operation, momentary switch operation, or when the limit switch is reached.

Lamellas return to previously set position in case of the main controller operation, momentary switch operation, when the limit switch is reached or after receiving a “STOP” control frame (Switch Multilevel Stop).

parameter.name: config_14_1
parameter.label: 14: Switch type
parameter.description: parameter settings are relevant for Roller Blind Mode and Venetian Blind Mode (parameter 10 set to 0, 1, 2).

parameter.name: config_17_1
parameter.label: 17: Delay time after S2
parameter.description: In roller blind mode or venetian blind mode (parameter 10 set to 0, 1, 2) the parameter determines when the Roller Shutter relays are turned off after reaching a limit switch. In Gate Mode (parameter 10 set to 3 or 4) the parameter determines a time period after which a gate will start closing after a S2 contact has been disconnected.

parameter.name: config_18_1
parameter.label: 18: Motor operation detection
parameter.description: Power threshold to be interpreted as reaching a limit switch.

parameter.name: config_22_2
parameter.label: 22: Motor operation time
parameter.description: Time period for the motor to continue operation.

parameter.name: config_29_1
parameter.label: 29: Forced Roller Shutter calibration
parameter.description: Seting the parameter to 1 Roller Shutter enters the calibration mode. Parameter is only only relevant if a Roller Shutter is set to work in positioning mode (parameter 10 set to 1, 2 or 4).

parameter.name: config_32_1
parameter.label: 32: Response to Smoke, CO, CO2 Alarm

parameter.name: config_35_1
parameter.label: 35: Managing lamellas in response to alarm
parameter.description: In Venetian Blind Mode (parameter 10 set to 2), the parameter determines how the lamellas will react upon alarm detection.

options.option: Set lamellas to their extreme position

parameter.name: config_40_1
parameter.label: 40: Power reports
parameter.description: Power level change that will result in new power value report being sent. value is a percentage of the previous report.

parameter.name: config_42_2
parameter.label: 42: Periodic power or energy reports
parameter.description: Time to the next report. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

parameter.name: config_43_1
parameter.label: 43: Energy reports
parameter.description: Energy level change which will result in new energy value report being sent. Value of 0 means the reports are turned off.

parameter.name: config_44_1
parameter.label: 44: Self-measurement
parameter.description: Enables/disables to include the power and energy used by itself in reports to main controller.

parameter.name: config_50_1
parameter.label: 50: Scenes/ Associations activation
parameter.description: Parameter determines whether scenes or associations are activated by the switch keys.

parameter.description: Triggered through a momentary switch click or a toggle switch position change
